parameters.incidence: Rate of melanoma cancer per 100,000 population.

title: Melanoma skin cancer incidence
description:
Description
These data from the Connecticut Tumor Registry present
age-adjusted numbers of melanoma skin-cancer incidences per
100,000 people in Connectict for the years from 1936 to 1972.
reference:
This dataset is not related to the melanoma
dataset in the boot package with the same name.
format: A data frame with 37 observations on the following 2 variables.
